verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> you have been <S%G4891>raised<s%> up with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> keep <S%G2212>seeking<s%> the things <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is, <S%G2521>seated<s%> at the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G5426>Set<s%> your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on the things <S%G507>above,<s%> not on the things that are on <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
For you have <S%G599>died<s%> and your <S%G2222>life<s%> is <S%G2928>hidden<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who is our <S%G2222>life,<s%> is <S%G5319>revealed,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> will be <S%G5319>revealed<s%> with Him in <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3499>consider<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> of your <S%G1093>earthly<s%> body as <S%G3499>dead<s%> to <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G167>impurity,<s%> <S%G3806>passion,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1939>desire,<s%> and <S%G4124>greed,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1510>amounts<s%> to <S%G1495>idolatry.<s%>
For it is on <S%G1223>account<s%> of <S%G3739>these<s%> <S%G3739>things<s%> that the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2064>come,<s%>
and in them you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G4043>walked,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you were <S%G2198>living<s%> in them.

But <S%G3570>now<s%> you <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G659>put<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G659>aside:<s%> <S%G3709>anger,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2549>malice,<s%> <S%G988>slander,<s%> [and] <S%G148>abusive<s%> <S%G148>speech<s%> from your <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>
Do not <S%G5574>lie<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> since you <S%G554>laid<s%> <S%G554>aside<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>self<s%> with its [evil] <S%G4234>practices,<s%>

and have <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3501>self<s%> who is being <S%G341>renewed<s%> to a <S%G1922>true<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the One who <S%G2936>created<s%> him

â€“ [a renewal] in <S%G3699>which<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> [distinction between] <S%G1672>Greek<s%> and <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G4061>circumcised<s%> and <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%G915>barbarian,<s%> <S%G4658>Scythian,<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> and <S%G1658>freeman,<s%> but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3956>all,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And <S%G3767>so,<s%> as those who have been <S%G1588>chosen<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G25>beloved,<s%> <S%G1746>put<s%> on a <S%G4698>heart<s%> of <S%G3628>compassion,<s%> <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> <S%G5012>humility,<s%> <S%G4240>gentleness<s%> and <S%G3115>patience;<s%>

<S%G430>bearing<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> <S%G1438>each<s%> <S%G1438>other,<s%> <S%G1437>whoever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3437>complaint<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>anyone;<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> you, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> should you.
And <S%G1909>beyond<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> [put on] <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G5047>perfect<s%> <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G4886>unity.<s%>

And let the <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1018>rule<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>indeed<s%> you were <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body;<s%> and be <S%G2170>thankful.<s%>

Let the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4146>richly<s%> <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> you, with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> and <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> with <S%G5568>psalms<s%> [and] <S%G5215>hymns<s%> [and] <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> with <S%G5485>thankfulness<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> [do] <S%G3956>all<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him to <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>
<S%G1135>Wives,<s%> be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to your <S%G435>husbands,<s%> as is <S%G433>fitting<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G435>Husbands,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G1135>wives,<s%> and do not be <S%G4087>embittered<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> them.
<S%G5043>Children,<s%> be <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to your <S%G1118>parents<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> is well-pleasing to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G3962>Fathers,<s%> do not <S%G2042>exasperate<s%> your <S%G5043>children,<s%> that they may not <S%G120>lose<s%> <S%G120>heart.<s%>

<S%G1401>Slaves,<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are your <S%G2962>masters<s%> on <S%G4561>earth,<s%> not with <S%G3787>external<s%> <S%G3787>service,<s%> as those <S%G441>who<s%> [merely] <S%G441>please<s%> <S%G441>men,<s%> but with <S%G572>sincerity<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3739>Whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2038>do<s%> your <S%G2038>work<s%> <S%G5590>heartily,<s%> as for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3756>rather<s%> <S%G2532>than<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G444>men;<s%>

<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> you will <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G469>reward<s%> of the <S%G2817>inheritance.<s%> It is the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> whom you <S%G1398>serve.<s%>

For he who <S%G91>does<s%> <S%G91>wrong<s%> will <S%G2865>receive<s%> the consequences of the <S%G91>wrong<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G91>done,<s%> and that <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G4382>partiality.<s%>
